Title: Excellent Food, very friendly  service
Comment:

Same can be said of the baklava that we shared as a dessert. 
Highly recommended!

Title: Amazing and delicious food
Comment: Had a great evening. Chucked in some falafel for free into our salad boxes. They gave us a little box of baklava for good measure. Good value for money

Title: Wow
Comment: Wow, superb. Had a great evening. Will be back definitely. Fantastic service from the staff. Very attentive. Good value for moneu

Title: Delicious food and an insight into Palestinian generosity
Comment:
My friends and I visited Hibox yesterday. The owner was in a cheery mood. Though Iâ€™m inclined to think that heâ€™s ALWAYS in a pleasant and joke-y mood. There were Palestinian, Egyptian and Turkish tunes in the background which he was singing along to. 

He...made us feel very welcome. Talked us through the food options. Chucked in some falafel for free into our salad boxes. And gave us a little box of baklava for good measure. Again, for free. 

The food was delicious, the portions were large, I didnâ€™t have food again until midnight. Quite possible the best falafel in London.More

Title: Amazing and delicious food
Comment: The food is so delicious, definitely coming again! The service is one of a kind, never experienced it in any other place around.

Comment: Super friendly staff with great energy! The falafel salad bowl was amazing with fresh ingredients, including fresh & hot falafels. 10/10 would recommend this spot!!

Title: Brilliant... exactly what I was looking for.. healthy, quick, nice, clean

Title: Best restaurant in London

Title: Quality service, great falafel

Title: Canâ€™t recommend this place enough - fantastic
Comment: Delicious, healthy, freshly cooked. Trust me, you donâ€™t need to be vegan or vegetarian to enjoy this place. Best food in all of London, and great value. Title: Best food and service !

Title: Good food

Title: Does what it does so well.
Comment: Popped in for a quick lunch after reading the very positive reviews and I was not disappointed. Lively welcome and ordered a box to eat in: mixed everything with offers of various sauces which was appreciated. Went downstairs to eat which is a modest but...functional space, so fine, and there are a few seats by the entrance too. A very nicely prepared, healthy and filling meal - I didn't need anything else after this. You're spoilt for choice regarding eating places on Goodge Street and in the Fitzrovia area, but you can't go wrong here if you like this kind of food, and who doesn't. Exceptional value too.More

Title: Best service everytime

Title: the taste of the levant in central London

Title: Go in here you won't regret it
Comment: Tasty vegan food by a nice man. Gave me some extra falafels which was not necessary. Help out your man he's doing an awesome job!

Title: Great lunch
Comment: So glad I stumbled on this place. Delicious food, friendly service. Great price and a perfect size!!

Title: Great food and first-class service
Comment: One of my regular lunch places and it never disappoints! The service is always extremely friendly and the prices very reasonable. Would recommend to anyone staying in the area.

Title: Great tasty food,lots of vegan and gf options, great service
Comment: Highly recommended. I used to go here during some lunch break before covid arrived and loved it for the variety of choices and quality of food. Everything is vegan and lots of gf options. I manage to come back last week and I was so...More

Title: Great food and excellent service
Comment: Food was superb, service was quick and friendly, and the prices very reasonable. I ordered the mixed box and will definitely be visiting again. Highly recommend.

Title: Great Food and super friendly service
Comment: I love this place. I don t write a lot of review but I really think that this place deserve a note. Food is just delicious, I use to go almost every day and I always enjoy my meal. price are fair and the service...More

Title: Great food, clean place and friendly customer service
Comment: I visited this place twice in a week's time. I had vegie rolls. Its easily the best I had. Very friendly guy called Tarik. And very reasonable price @Â£5.

Title: Excellent food and friendly service
Comment: So many delicious flavours! Perfect food for taking away to sit in the park at lunch time with colleagues, friends or family :)

Title: For start I am not vegan but
Comment: For start I am not vegan but this place is a must to try. I always try some vegan stuff with my girfriend but for me this was the best so far.

Title: Best vegan place arround!
Comment: Best vegan place arround! Iâ€™m a meat eater and often visit this place when I want a healthy alternative! 5 stars!!

Title: Lovely lunchtime meal!
Comment: My work colleague and I stumbled upon this lovely Lebanese eatery when we were looking for somewhere to have a quick lunch. So glad we did! The food was delicious, the service amazing and the value for money excellent!! Plus all Covid safe and clean...More

Title: Lunch at HiBox
Comment: Beautiful service, delicious food! Nice little space to get a rapid meal on a busy day. Spent my entire afternoon here, totally recommend.

Title: excellent foot, great service
Comment:
had a really great experience at this palce- would definitely recommend
healthy fresh delicious food

Title: Amazing food at a great price!!
Comment: I ordered the box full of Lebanese dishes. It was fresh and very tasty. The service was excellent as well. Finished the portion completely! Very highly recommended.

Title: Really delicious takeaway
Comment: Really delicious takeaway lunch today at terrific prices. Authentic flavours and real mix of Lebanese classics, with generous helpings and friendly service!

Title: Very tasty and cheap
Comment: Good prices vegan food. Very clean and great service. Tarik is very friendly and professional. I had the tapouleh salad with babaghanoug and it was delicious. I highly recommend this place for anyone looking to eat healthy.

Title: Amazing food and service!
Comment: Amazing food and service! Great falafel at good price and the waiter was very attentive. Will repeat :)

Title: The best Vegan and Palestinian food in town
Comment: Amazing food, this shop has the best taste food ever for Vegans and people like me that enjoys Mezze food. All so fresh and delicious super central to get to it.

Title: Amazing food! Amazing service! A must visit!
Comment: Me and my boyfriend came here for some lunch and had 2 large boxes with everything. The server was so kind and made the box for us so nicely and gave us a extra falafel on a stick mid bowl! The food... AMAZING!! Truly wholesome,...More

Title: Beautiful salads
Comment: Stopped here for lunch. Friendly service, super clean and wonderful food. I highly recommend. Great music too!More

Title: Great food and good price.
Comment: Really good salad box - good price. Friendly staff. Would highly recommend!!! V healthy and all vegan

Title: Good vegetarian options
Comment:
Young and friendly staff and delicious veggetarian options. Before Corona I used to come to the restaurant with my own tupperware (that I reuse) and they would put no objections to that. 
Today I came back and they gave me a cardboard container (much better...More

Title: Great, Healthy Food and Friendly Service!
Comment:
The food at Hibox is fantastic. If you are looking for fresh, healthy and delicious vegetarian food, look no further!
The service is always fantastic and friendly.

Title: Great service,very tasty food,
Comment: Great service,very tasty food, healthy vegan options. Tarik is loved by everyone, he clearly loves the job ! Thanks for a great experience. Iâ€™ll be back for more definitely!More

Title: Great salads and super friendly
Comment: Great salads and super friendly service - highly recommended for a quick lunch! Gotta try the falafel wrap too

Title: Great food, value and service
Comment: Really tasty falafel and salads. Great for vegans but also delicious for meat eaters. The service is always really friendly, would highly recommend.

Title: Great vegan lunch
Comment: Very filling and high quality delicious Palestinian food - the go to for my meat free Mondays!  They are really friendly and  always give a great daily range of treats!

Title: Worth a visit if in the Fitzrovia area
Comment: Tariq always provides an excellent customer service; which is prompt and with a friendly welcome. The food is delicious, fresh and vegan friendly.

Title: Great place for Vegan Palestinian
Comment: Great place for Vegan Palestinian & Lebanese cuisine in Fitzrovia. Great food quality, super friendly staff and cozy environment. Salad boxes with falafel my favourite ones. Highly recommended!!

Title: Excellent healthy food!
Comment: Visit this place often for lunch. The salad box is one of the best deals in town. A wide variety of delicious and healthy food and is always fresh!More

Title: Amazing vegan lunch
Comment: Extremely tasty wraps and very good value. One of the best vegan places I've tried so far in London! Great seats outside in the sun as well!

Title: Best vegan lebanese
Comment: Really tasty food, huge portions, best falafal, can't fault this place and very friendly service to top it off.. Definitely give this place a try, even if your not vegan you will not be disappointed and if your are vegan this is heaven on a...More

Title: Delicious Food!
Comment: Incredible spread of dishes to mix from and always fresh. Great regular lunch grab! Definitely recommend popping in!

Title: Delicious
Comment: A real gem of a place. Great food, great service and great tunes! Can't recommend highly enough. My friend Josh can't get enough

Title: Beautiful & delicious
Comment: Great service, decent prices, fills your tummy at lunch time. Aesthetically pleasing and yummy. What more could ya want!?

Title: Mr
Comment: The best Vegan food I have had in central London and the staff look after you like family... Great place
